Class ControllerChoose

"Controller" class for the pokèmon selection. Contains methods and attributes used to interact with models.

loadPokémon(String, String)

Method that reads data from files to load pokémon in the list.

Declaration
public List<Pokémon> loadPokémon(string pathPokémon, string pathSkill)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String pathPokémon

File path with pokémon data.
System.String pathSkill

file path with skills data.
Returns
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.List<Pokémon>

List of pokémon with the appropriate skills.
Remarks

Reading takes place on two ".csv" files, one for pokémon and one for skills.
